API.Comments: Returns the first instance of a ToolProvider with the given name, as loaded by ServiceLoader using the system class loader.
Returns the name of this tool provider.
Runs an instance of the tool, returning zero for a successful run.
API.Function: run(PrintStream out, PrintStream err, String... args)

API.Comments: Runs an instance of the tool, returning zero for a successful run.
API.Function: run(PrintWriter out, PrintWriter err, String... args)
